pullrequest.title: Make CMake variables use versioned project name

content.raw:
I agree. Forcing this type of change on downstream developers is abnormal, and a bit burdensome. 

Also, side-by-side versions of a library does not mean they should also link in the same project. This is highly unusual, and doesn't seem like something we should support.
content.html:
I agree. Forcing this type of change on downstream developers is abnormal, and a bit burdensome.

Also, side-by-side versions of a library does not mean they should also link in the same project. This is highly unusual, and doesn't seem like something we should support.
